definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]
100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]

pinyin: an1 ji1 jia3 suan1 zhi3 lei4 hua4 he2 wu4
huang2 tong2 lei4 hua4 he2 wu4

sentences.english: The new progress of investigation of the organogermanium compounds is discussed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文討論了有機鍺化合物研究在國內的新進展。

sentences.english: This inhibiting effect was due chiefly to the concentration of combined nitrogen.
sentences.chinese: 化合態氮的抑制作用與濃度密切相關。

sentences.english: There exists a close relationship between plants and chiral compounds.
sentences.chinese: 植物與手性化合物存在着非常密切的聯繫。

sentences.english: The invention also relates to tyrosine hydroxylase revulsant.
sentences.chinese: 本發明化合物是酪氨酸羥化酶誘導劑。

sentences.english: The stuff in the sugar bowl. We’re not talking about complex carbohydrates, which are merely long strings of sugars.
sentences.chinese: 我們不討論碳水化合物，那是一長串糖的合成物。

sentences.english: The compatibilities of molybdenum dialkyldithiocarbamateand Cacompounds in greases were studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了氨基甲酸鉬和鈣化合物在潤滑脂中的配伍性。

sentences.english: and macromolecular clumps of organic material called kerogen.
sentences.chinese: 最後是一種叫做油母質的大分子化合物。

sentences.english: The water and the organic compound can be reused.
sentences.chinese: 水和有機化合物可以被重複利用。

sentences.english: Isomers are defined as compounds having the same formula but different structures.
sentences.chinese: 異構體被定義爲化學式相同而結構不同的化合物。

sentences.english: Hydrotalcite-like compounds are a sort of anionic clays with double-layer structure.
sentences.chinese: 水滑石類化合物是一種具有層狀結構的陰離子粘土。

sentences.english: The type second highest in flavonoids is unsweetened baking chocolate.
sentences.chinese: 含黃酮類化合物第二高的是未加糖烘培的巧克力。

sentences.english: The influences of semiochemicals on host selection behavior of natural enemies.
sentences.chinese: 信息化合物對天敵選擇寄主行爲的影響。

sentences.english: Compounds 3, 10 and 4 also had high activities.
sentences.chinese: 化合物3，4，10也表現出較高的抗真菌活性。

sentences.english: The result show that all the natural amino-acids will follow the rule of helix theory.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，氨基酸類化合物也遵從螺旋理論的規律。

sentences.english: When several compounds are formed, there is the possibility of more than one peritectic point .
sentences.chinese: 當生成數種化合物時，就可能有一個以上的轉熔點。

sentences.english: In this article, atom-pairs of compounds, which include abundant three-dimensional information of molecules, were calculated.
sentences.chinese: 採用原子對空間距離法表徵化合物的三維結構信息。

definition: simple substance (consisting purely of one element, such as diamond)
dissociation/to break up a chemical compound into its elements
